property.name: Calcs
property.description: Type "C". Calculated fields to define for report

property.name: Parameters
property.description: Type "C". Parameters to define for report.

property.name: Subreport_Name_Placeholder
property.description: Type "C". Placeholder name (used to replace subreport content when it is evaliated)

property.name: Grand
property.description: Type "ReportGroupDef". Pointer to top level report grouping definition.

property.name: Group
property.description: Type "ReportGroupDef". Pointer to groups in report

property.name: Detail
property.description: Type "ReportGroupDef". Pointer to detail level of report.

methodref.name: EnumArguments
methodref.description: Return a cr-lf delimited list of arguments passed (from parent contexts) to this report.

methodref.name: EnumGroups
methodref.description: Return a cr-lf delimited list of groups.

methodref.name: EnumParameters
methodref.description: Return a cr-lf delimited list of parameters defined AND arguments from parent contexts.

methodref.name: EnumSubReport
methodref.description: Return a cr-lf delimited list of subreports - if recurseSeparator is provided, returns the hierarchy.

methodref.name: GetGroup
methodref.description: Return group from name (includes grand and detail).

methodref.name: GetSubReport
methodref.description: Retrieve a subreport definition by name.

methodref.name: GroupNumber
methodref.description: Get the index of a Group from the name.

methodref.name: MoveGroup
methodref.description: Move a block of Group items.

page.original:
Reporting::ReportDef Class Properties Property Type Description Name C Name of report Source C Source for report data Calcs C Calculated fields to define for report Parameters C Parameters to define for report. Collapsed C Collapsed state Subreport_Template C Subreport defintion Subreport_Name_Placeholder C Placeholder name (used to replace subreport content when it is evaliated) Grand ReportGroupDef Pointer to top level report grouping definition. Group ReportGroupDef Pointer to groups in report Detail ReportGroupDef Pointer to detail level of report. definition C Text definiton for report. ReportObjectResources ReportObjectResources List of resources
Methods Method Description PUBLIC AddSubReport AS v (name AS C ,C definition AS )Add a new subreport definition. PUBLIC Clone AS P ()Create a copy of an object instance. PUBLIC Create AS l (definition AS C)Create Report definition from text. PUBLIC DeleteGroup AS L (as N AS Index)Delete a Group. PUBLIC EnumArguments AS c ()Return a cr-lf delimited list of arguments passed (from parent contexts) to this report. PUBLIC EnumGroups AS c ()Return a cr-lf delimited list of groups. PUBLIC EnumParameters AS c ()Return a cr-lf delimited list of parameters defined AND arguments from parent contexts. PUBLIC EnumSubReport AS c (recurseSeparator] AS [C)Return a cr-lf delimited list of subreports - if recurseSeparator is provided, returns the hierarchy. PUBLIC GetGroup AS Reporting::ReportGroupDef (name AS C)Return group from name (includes grand and detail). PUBLIC GetSubReport AS Reporting::ReportDef (name AS C)Retrieve a subreport definition by name. PUBLIC GroupNumber AS N (as C AS Name)Get the index of a Group from the name. PUBLIC InsertGroup AS L (as Reporting::ReportGroupDef [ AS Group ,InsertBefore as N = 1] AS )Insert a new Group. PUBLIC MoveGroup AS L (as N AS MoveTo ,MoveFrom as N [ItemsToCopy as N = 1] AS )Move a block of Group items. PUBLIC NewInstance AS P ()Create a new object instance of the same type.
See Also Reporting Namespace
